doc.title: Cannes: Through the Eyes of the Hunter
doc.plot: Wednesday, May 10th 2000. Dozens of stars, hundreds of journalists and thousands of fans have come together in the south of France. Amongst them is Markus. He is an autograph collector who has come here to get signatures from the famous. With careful preparation, finesse and the help of his friends he is making his way through this ultimate playground for an autograph collector - the Cannes Film Festival. This documentary will follow him through the ten days of wonderful madness that is Cannes. It will show him on his search for the celebrities and the hunt for the stars. Will Markus get the autograph he wants the most - Elizabeth Taylor?
